argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | ngpds2.x | |- X = ( Base ` G ) |
| 2 |  | ngpds2.z | |- .0. = ( 0g ` G ) |
| 3 |  | ngpds2.m | |- .- = ( -g ` G ) |
| 4 |  | ngpds2.d | |- D = ( dist ` G ) |
| 5 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( norm ` G ) = ( norm ` G ) |
| 6 | 5, 1, 3, 4 | #P_ngpds | |- ( ( G e. NrmGrp /\ A e. X /\ B e. X ) -> ( A D B ) = ( ( norm ` G ) ` ( A .- B ) ) ) |
| 7 |  | #P_ngpgrp | |- ( G e. NrmGrp -> G e. Grp ) |
| 8 | 1, 3 | #P_grpsubcl | |- ( ( G e. Grp /\ A e. X /\ B e. X ) -> ( A .- B ) e. X ) |
| 9 | 7, 8 | #P_syl3an1 | |- ( ( G e. NrmGrp /\ A e. X /\ B e. X ) -> ( A .- B ) e. X ) |
| 10 | 5, 1, 2, 4 | #P_nmval | |- ( ( A .- B ) e. X -> ( ( norm ` G ) ` ( A .- B ) ) = ( ( A .- B ) D .0. ) ) |
| 11 | 9, 10 | #P_syl | |- ( ( G e. NrmGrp /\ A e. X /\ B e. X ) -> ( ( norm ` G ) ` ( A .- B ) ) = ( ( A .- B ) D .0. ) ) |
| 12 | 6, 11 | #P_eqtrd | |- ( ( G e. NrmGrp /\ A e. X /\ B e. X ) -> ( A D B ) = ( ( A .- B ) D .0. ) ) |
